assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: AU Small Finance Bank Limited provides various banking and financial services in India. It operates through Treasury, Retail Banking, Wholesale Banking, and Other Banking Operations segments. The company offers savings and current accounts; fixed and recurring deposits; locker services; point of sale machines; mutual funds; general, fire, life, and health insurance products; and investment products. It also provides vehicle, commercial vehicle, tractor, two-wheeler, home, consumer finance and personal, gold, secured business, and agri-SME loans, as well as NBFC/HFC/MFI lending; business banking, trade finance and forex; and construction and builder finances. In addition, the company offers bank guarantee, letters of credit, discounting of letter of credit, clean bill discounting, import and export bill collections, and inward and outward remittance services; digital banking services, such as Internet, missed call and mobile banking; unified payment interface and Bharat bill payment systems; and EMI payment and other payments services; and government banking services to central government, states governments, central and state public sector undertakings, boards, defense, urban local bodies, and other government departments. As of March 31, 2020, it operated 406 bank branches, 122 banking outlets, 88 business correspondents, 31 asset centers, 13 offices, and 356 ATMs. The company was formerly known as AU Financiers (India) Limited and changed its name to AU Small Finance Bank Limited in May 2017. AU Small Finance Bank Limited was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Jaipur, India.
